title: add-module input
description: Input schema of the add-module action

volumes.description: Optional mapping of application volume names to filesystem mount points.

check_idle_time.title: Agent liveness check limit
check_idle_time.description: Change the default check limit value (default 8 seconds)

image.title: Module image name
image.description: Name of the module image to install. If the image is not a URL, install the latest version of the module. Otherwise, just install the provided URL.

node.title: Node ID
node.description: Node identifier where the module has to be installed
